attributes.action: Bring back rent to buy scheme in Wales so that people can purchase council homes
attributes.additional_details: Alot of people who move into social housing, move in to very run down properties. Some spend thousands over the months and years turning these houses into their homes. Most live in their council owned homes for very long periods of time, raise their children there, work locally etc.. Unfortunately rent to buy no longer exsists in Wales but I feel it should be brought back so that people who wish to buy are not forced to leave the homes they live in and love and they are able to purchase the house they have been renting.
attributes.background: Bring back the rent to buy scheme so that people living in social housing have the opportunity to purchase the homes they have been renting and are not forced to leave the property they love just because they want to become home owners.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
